articles.title: Facebook Says It Will Remove Misinformation About Coronavirus Vaccines, Adopting A Tougher Stance - Deadline
articles.description: As Covid-19 vaccines start rolling out this month, Facebook has toughened its stance on vaccine misinformation about the coronavirus and will start to remove false claims from its platforms. In a blog post Thursday, the social media giant said it will remove …
articles.content:
As Covid-19 vaccines start rolling out this month, Facebook has toughened its stance on vaccine misinformation about the coronavirus and will start to remove false claims from its platforms.

articles.title: Facebook says it will ban all coronavirus vaccine conspiracy theories - Daily Mail
articles.description: Facebook says it will expand its crackdown on disinformation related to the coronavirus vaccine by banning all false content in the coming weeks while the inoculation is due to be rolled out.
articles.content: Facebook says it will expand its crackdown on disinformation related to the coronavirus vaccine by banning all false content in the coming weeks, including claims that it is a ruse to install microch… [+10554 chars]

articles.title: Ontario reports more than 1,800 new coronavirus cases, 14 more deaths - CP24 Toronto's Breaking News
articles.description: Ontario is reporting more than 1,800 new COVID-19 cases and 14 more deaths but Thursday’s case count reflects an overestimate due to a processing error.
articles.content:
Ontario is reporting more than 1,800 new COVID-19 cases and 14 more deaths but Thursdays case count reflects an overestimate due to a processing error.

articles.title: Facebook to start removing false claims about coronavirus vaccine - Daily Mail
articles.description: False claims about the jab doing the rounds on the site will be removed and expand its ban on anti-vaxx adverts to include those regarding the Covid vaccination.
articles.content:
Facebook will remove harmful anti-vaxx propaganda from the social media platform as the world prepares to receive the first coronavirus vaccine.   
False claims about the jab doing the rounds on the… [+4809 chars]

articles.title: Family seeking COVID is 'playing with a loaded gun' in B.C. city discouraging visitors: mayor - CTV News Vancouver
articles.description: The mayor of Revelstoke is speaking out after a local family was rumoured to be trying to get infected with the coronavirus.
articles.content:
VANCOUVER --

articles.title: 30 new coronavirus cases confirmed in Simcoe Muskoka, local total reaches 2,178 - Global News
articles.description: Of the total number of 2,178 coronavirus cases, 86 per cent -- or 1,864 -- have recovered, while 13 people remain in hospital.
articles.content:
The Simcoe Muskoka District Health Unit confirmed 30 new novel coronavirus cases on Wednesday, bringing the local total number of cases up to 2,178, including 52 deaths.
